name: ErrEventStatusUpdate function
description: Tests the ErrEventStatusUpdate function for creating event status update error

steps.name: creates error with event ID and status

parameters.name: Actual
parameters.value: *errors.Error(&errors.Error{Code:"meshery_cloud-2016", Severity:2, ShortDescription:[]string{"Failed to update status for event with ID: event-456"}, LongDescription:[]string{"invalid status"}, ProbableCause:[]string{"Database connection issues", "Event does not exist", "Invalid status value"}, SuggestedRemediation:[]string{"Check database connectivity", "Verify event exists", "Ensure status value is valid"}})

parameters.name: Target Struct
parameters.value: "invalid status | Short Description: Failed to update status for event with ID: event-456 | Probable Cause: Database connection issues.Event does not exist.Invalid status value | Suggested Remediation: Check database connectivity.Verify event exists.Ensure status value is valid"
